title: Create a simple 'Hello World' React component.
Build a counter application with increment and decrement buttons.
Create a form that takes user input and displays it in real-time.

How to manipulate state in one component using React and pass that state as props to another component?
How to highlight elements in a list under certain conditions in React and use buttons to control that highlighting process?

How to add the values of two input fields using React and show the result?
How to display, update, and remove JSON data loaded in React, as well as toggle visibility of data using conditional rendering?
Multiple states to one state handling.
How to manage object state in React and change the visual style and values displayed in the UI by changing the state with the click of a button?

Implement a basic toggle switch component.
Create a component that fetches data from an API and displays it.
Build a timer that counts down from a specified time.
Implement a simple to-do list application with add and remove functionality.
